title: Sunny - Modern Furnished Cambridge Townhouse
posting_body: Rent negotiable depending on the lease length.
This is a bright, modern and sparkling clean in a new building, South facing Townhouse right on Massachusetts Ave in N Cambridge.
High ceilings, spacious, with pretty nice organized closet space in all bedrooms and the office.
Every room including the garage has full daylight and oversized windows.
Fully furnished: all kinds of appliances, bedsheets, towels, full kitchen(juicer, coffee maker, kettle, toaster, instant pot etc.)
You can move in with your own belongings and you`ll be all set!
Easy commute to Harvard, MIT, Tufts, MGH(there is a bus stop right in front that goes directly to Harvard Sq and Porter T station on Red line).
Also there is a BlueBike station 5 mins away.
5 mins bike or 13 mins walk to Davis and Alewife T stations.
Route 16 is 2 mins away.
Busy neighborhood which is peaceful at night; we may hear some noise occasionally.
The entire unit has hardwood floors.
Office space is in a remote location in the house and is the only room in the entry level.
High quality essentials; towels, sheets, hangers, blankets, pillows.
Dual zone a/c for the first two floors and the 3rd floor.
Fully equipped kitchen.
Washer& Dryer in unit.
All storage spaces including the hallway storage for shoes and coats have organizers set in them, so you literally need no more storage furniture.
Easy access by bike.
Garage has easy access from side street, first garage in the driveway, has convenient EV charging.

Master Bedroom no1: On the top floor, en-suite very spacious bathroom with skylight, biggest closet space, gets plenty of sun which also has blackout shades, organic latex, plush bed with natural wool topper, gets morning and early afternoon sun.
Beddings, linens, towels, hairdryer, drawer, biggest organized closet in the house.
Master Bedroom no2: On the top floor, en-suite very spacious bathroom with skylight and bathtub, gets morning and full afternoon sun.
Adjustable Tempur-pedic base with remote control, organic natural latex bed.
Secluded desk area.
Beddings, linens, towels, hairdryer, organized closet.

Bedroom no3: On the second floor, gets morning and early afternoon sun, huge windows, even higher ceilings, has a full bathroom with heated floors, beddings, linens, towels, hairdryer, drawer, extra closet with organizers.
Office:
Entry level, comes with: adjustable desk with height memory function, computer screen, file cabinet, printer/copy machine.
Basement: Organized stainless steel shelves, neat, with air control.
Garage: Dedicated attached garage with EV charging outlet, easy access from side street, first garage in the driveway, organized durable shelves, bike storage(gets two adult sized bikes)
You will love this place!
Please contact me for your questions and to schedule a visit with covid-related precautions taken.
Notes:
No smoking building.
No shoes were used indoors.
Water included in the rent.
Minimum stay is 6 months, flexible lease start(latest by November)
Dual zone A/C
• Rent: $5895/Month (negotiable for longer leases) + Utilities around 200$, water included in the rent
• Beds: 3
• Office:1
• Bath: 3
• Available move in date: Mid August
• Pet: Non-shedding hypoallergenic dog breeds and birds are allowed, both small and large.
• Parking: Dedicated attached garage, easy access from side street, first garage in the driveway, convenient EV charging outlet.
